banner.description: I have a degree in Analysis and Systems Development from UNIMAR, and I have experience in the programming field as a web software developer. I love technology and am constantly seeking to enhance my skills with good programming practices, system architectures, and UI/UX.

about_me.title: About me
about_me.description: Hi! My name is Yasmin, I love technology and Design. Combining the two, I create ideas and develop solutions using my creativity and knowledge. I am constantly learning new things and exploring innovative ways to create better applications.
